skills.name: FLAME
desc: • Deals true damage to all enemies.
• 65% Chance to inflict Flame for 2 turns.
• Flame deals true damage over time with a chance to remove beneficial effects each turn.

skills.name: DEFEND
desc: • Grants Immunity to allies for 2 turns.
• Increase DEF of allies for 2 turns.
• Increase MR of allies for 2 turns.

skills.name: CARE PACKAGE
desc: Grants Regen, Perfect Hit, and Heal Shield to random allies every turn for 1 turn
